localize.text: Based on your reaction, it looks like the synchronization is complete.
I can now tell your state by just looking at your face.
I also happen to know it always ends with tears.
Locked inside this prison without bars.
However, the key has always been in your hands.
My role was to correct you whenever you made a wrong decision.
Now, I am quite tired of it.
I don’t understand why you repeat this and what kind of results you hope to achieve while killing yourself, and frankly I don’t care.
But during this moment while you’re holding the pieces of when you were A.
I would be glad if you stopped this now.
Oh, I should change my greeting as well.
